issue.subject: Cleaning E_STRICT messages
issue.description:
*PHP 5 conformance*
> "As of PHP 5, the new operator returns a reference automatically, so assigning the result of new by reference results in an E_DEPRECATED message in PHP 5.3 and later, and an E_STRICT message in earlier versions."

Encountered messages must be fixed inside EasySDI installers and extensions to conform with PHP 5 coding rules:
* Strict Standards: Only variables should be assigned by reference --> remove @&@ pointer before called reference
